title: All-Party Parliamentary Group for Ethnic Minority Business Owners
purpose: The APPG for Ethnic Minority Business Owners aims to promote the advancement of businesses owned by Black, Asian and Minority Ethnic people to reduce barriers and unlock their potential for the overall benefit of the UKâ€™s economy.
